message:
SYSTEM: Jmora20100527.pdf: Página 8
Semantic triple match
• Sources described with several triples instead of 
single n-ary predicates.
• Requires graph matching in query preconditions
• Allows partial match
• Allows composition of conditions
• Postconditions require more complex unifications
• Merging of information is more straigtforward
• Constraints on the information after merging 
(decomposed query) should not be less (correctness) 
or more (completude) than in the original query
• This problem may already be solved in ISI at the 
current time
8
speaker: SYSTEM
